root.name: Environmental Station Alpha
root.description: OverviewEnvironmental Station Alpha is an upcoming action-adventure game in the style of Metroid being developed by Arvi Teikari (Hempuli).StoryEnvironmental Station Alpha served as a preserve for unique lifeforms and environments. Following an indeterminate engine failure the station was abandoned. Decades later signals originating from the station are received. A remote controlled robot is dispatched to the station to uncover the reasons behind the signals.GameplayESA is heavily influenced my games akin to Metroid and Castlevania Symphon of the Night. The player explores the fate of Environmental Station Alpha using a remote controlled robot. During the course of the game the player will find powerups that grant new abilites. DevelopmentThe game is developed by Hempuli (Arvi Teikari) using the Multimedia Fusion 2 development tools. The native resolution of the game is 160x120.
